import { Facebook, Instagram, MapPin, Phone, Mail } from "lucide-react"; import logotipoFooter from "../../assets/logoZOOM3.jpeg"; export function Footer() { const Viewes = () => { window.open("/terminos2.pdf", "_blank"); }; return (
